name: Upwardz
description:
Just go up! This is all you have to do in this super casual jump and jump game. A one-finger-tap-app where you have to tap the screen to let your cute little monster jump and make a swipe to the right to let your character jump higher and wider to reach the next platform. Remember the clock is ticking and you don't have time to hang around or you will fall and therefore fail. So jump right in and have fun to go Upwardz!

Features:
- Six characters to unlock
- Game Center

Another fine Z-APP!
